title: Manzanita 2023
description: Annual beach vacation to Manzanita Oregon.

images.title: Ecola State Park
images.description: Beautiful view from Ecola State Park very close to the parking lot. We're looking south.  We hiked the Indian Beach Trial to Indian Beach and we had great weather.

images.title: Wall Sandcastle
images.description: One of the many sandcastles Tom and Steve made.

images.title: Esher Sandcastle
images.description: Our attempt at making the impossible Esher staircases in sand.

images.title: Hot Tub House
images.description: We stayed that the house at the end of the path which is at the end of Beach Street. It has a hot tub on the front deck and a eletric car charger in the garage.

images.title: Manzanita Beach
images.description: Neahkahni Mountain and Manzanita Beach and a couple of seagulls flying home for the evening.

images.title: Summer Sunset
images.description: Golden hour on the beach. After dinner we bundle up and rush down to the beach to see the sunset.

images.title: Elk Run Trail
images.description: Doug and I rode our bikes all the way to the Nehalem River on the Elk Run trail. This view looks south across the marsh.

images.title: Elk Run Trail
images.description: This tests the pixel perfect border for two images combined for a panoramic.
